metadata.name: context-catalog-mcp
metadata.description: An MCP server that provides structured contextual resources (contexts, files, and sections) from Markdown and JSON files for AI reasoning.
metadata.author: Krzysztof Surdy

getAvailableResources.description: Lists all available resources, optionally filtered by prefix ID (e.g. 'tests|testing').

getResourceContent.description: Retrieves the full content of a resource and optionally its children.

findResourceByPhrases.description: Searches for resources by phrases (case-insensitive whole-word match).
